title: LOL sometimes opens with a random patch even tho i patched the most recent one
body: So i opened up lol today and it started a random patch at 33 but i already patched 6.15 i tried some solutions like deleting lol air client but now its showing the update failed notification im rly frustrated rn pls help!

replies.body: Update: i deleted lol air client and now its a 2000 mb patch so i rly dk y it opened the random patch im okay with waiting it out now but rito YYYY did it open like that this happens every few patches

It sounds like your patcher was trying to repair and download files, but a network issue was preventing a connection to the patching server.  Your best bet is to keep waiting and allowing the patcher to finish.  Closing it can restart the process over again.  If you receive an error after 33%, go through our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to establish a connection and finish up the download.  Hope that helps!
